summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via updated CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` (dark blue palette for dark mode) and setting `defaultTheme="dark"` on the `ThemeProvider` in `frontend/src/App.tsx` for all major render paths (public search, loading, login, authenticated). No missing requirements are evident from the provided diff summary. However, there are additional meta/project-tracking changes and claims in `frontend-file-summaries.txt` that describe unrelated UI/feature work not supported by the listed modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state updates adding new feature request entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for theme/token updates and defaulting to dark mode; it did not request changes to any project state metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: `frontend-file-summaries.txt` claims extensive changes across many UI pages/components and hooks (e.g., useQueries fail-fast changes, MainLayout/Login gradient updates, dashboard/task/client/team feature additions, dialog/select opaque background changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: These items are not requested by the BuildRequest (which focuses only on dark blue theming + default dark mode), and they also are not corroborated by the diff's 'Modified files' list (which only shows `App.tsx`, `index.css`, `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, and `project_state.json`).
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list in diff summary
